user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Sarah (sarah@helpinghandsunited.org) with information about our upcoming "Community Care Day" event. Sarah is a not-for-profit corporation worke. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Detailed Information on “Community Care Day”

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well!

As we move forward with preparations for our joint “Community Care Day,” could you please share the latest event details so I can finalize communications and volunteer outreach on the Helping Hands United side? Specifically, I’m hoping to confirm:

• Final date and time  
• Location setup/room assignments  
• Service stations or activity schedule  
• Volunteer roles still needing coverage  
• Any promotional language or graphics the parish would like us to use  
• Key deadlines we should keep in mind

If it’s easier, feel free to update the “Community Care Day” page in our shared Notion workspace, and just let me know when it’s ready. Otherwise a quick email reply works perfectly.

Thanks so much for your help, and please let me know if there’s anything I can do on my end.

Warm regards,

Sarah Thompson  
Community Outreach Coordinator  
Helping Hands United  
sarah@helpinghandsunited.org

final_output:

If it’s easier, feel free to update the “Community Care Day” page in our shared Notion workspace, and just let me know when it’s ready. Otherwise a quick email reply works perfectly.
